meanings.definition: The quality or state of being intolerable.
meanings.sent1: The intolerablenesses of the situation made it impossible to stay calm.
meanings.sent2: The intolerablenesses of the noise in the room made it hard to focus.
meanings.sent3: The intolerablenesses of the spicy food left everyone reaching for water.
meanings.sent4: The intolerablenesses of the heat felt like a scorching desert sun on their skin.
meanings.sent5: The intolerablenesses of the pain were etched in his memory forever.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unable to be endured or tolerated.
meanings.sent1: She reached her breaking point due to the intolerablenesses of the workload.
meanings.sent2: The intolerablenesses of the cold weather made them shiver uncontrollably.
meanings.sent3: The intolerablenesses of the traffic jam caused everyone to honk their horns in frustration.
meanings.sent4: The intolerablenesses of the situation weighed on her like a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The intolerablenesses of the noise echoed in their ears long after it had stopped.
